aliah.title: Aliah Bellydance Fashion
aliah.text: <0>A famous European brand of high-quality exclusive bellydance costumes handmade by the organizer of Dance Weekend in Warsaw festival – Aliah!</0><0>The costumes and fashion shows of Aliah Bellydance Fashion are presented at marketplaces of the best european and worldwide festivals. Happy owners of her costumes return to get new ones again and again.</0><0>Besides selling ready costumes, Aliah can take your order for an individually made costume according to your wishes and measures or group costumes.</0>

ostrovska.title: Design studio ANNA OSTROVSKA
ostrovska.text: <0>For over 10 years Design studio ANNA OSTROVSKA professionally creates training clothes and accessories for dance, show and celebrations. Training clothes from Anna have no rivals in terms of their high production quality and original design, which makes them very popular among the dancers. Every detail is carefully created with thoughts about wearer comfort.</0><0>Design studio ANNA OSTROVSKA also takes orders for individual and group costumes of any level.</0><0>Design studio ANNA OSTROVSKA — Your winning image!</0>
